de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.animation

Interface AnimationType


  • public interface AnimationType
    An animation type describes the behavior of frames which belong to a certain animation.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int updateCurrentFrame(int lastFrame, int currentFrame, int totalFrames, int origin)
      Updates the given frame and returns it.

    • Method Detail

      • updateCurrentFrame

        int updateCurrentFrame(int lastFrame,
                     int currentFrame,
                     int totalFrames,
                     int origin)
        Updates the given frame and returns it. This operation is immutable.
        Parameters:
        currentFrame - the current frame
        totalFrames - number of total frames
        Returns:
        the optionally modified current frame
